title: For Loops: Sum a Range
description: Use for loops to iterate and calculate the sum of a range of numbers.

steps.title: Sum 1 to 10 using for loop
steps.prompt: Calculate the sum of numbers from 1 to 10 using a for loop with range()

validation.errorMessage: Use total += i to add each number

hints: Inside the loop, use total += i

storyContext.initialDialogue: 1부터 10까지 더하는 걸 자동으로 해 줄 수 있을까?
